title: mercy
comment: A quality of compassion, especially as expressed in God's forgiveness of human sin. Scripture stresses God's forbearance towards sinners. In his mercy, God shields sinners from what they deserve and gives gifts that they do not deserve.

children.title: mercy, nature of God's
children.comment: A central aspect of God's character,  expressed in his covenant relationships  with undeserving people.

children.title: God's mercy is expressed in his faithfulness to his covenant with his people
God's faithfulness and mercy are never-ending
God's mercy and grace are seen in Jesus Christ
God's mercy is not confined to the Jewish nation
God chooses when and where to exercise his mercy
God's responds in mercy to those who call to him

primaryrefs.comment: There are many appeals to God's mercy in the book of Psalms.

children.title: mercy, demonstration of God's
children.comment: God demonstrates his mercy in his various dealings with his people.

children.title: God's mercy and compassion to those in distress
In judgment, God's mercy is just and true
God may choose to show no mercy
God's mercy shown in his actions

seealsos.comment: In the OT, salvation was seen in physical, as much as in spiritual, terms

children.title: mercy, of Jesus Christ
children.comment: Jesus Christ displays the same attitude of grace and mercy towards men and women as his Father does.

children.title: Jesus Christ's concern for people in need
Jesus Christ's response to appeals for mercy
Jesus Christ's mercy in response to judgment
Jesus Christ's mercy is shown in his actions
mercy, response to God's
children.comment: God's merciful dealings with believers should move them to show similar acts of mercy to others, as well as to rejoice in his graciousness and proclaim it to others.

children.title: The proper response to God's mercy
Mercy is to be a characteristic of daily living
By God's mercy, the believer can persevere
Sharing God's grace and mercy with others
mercy, human
children.comment: Believers are urged to show the same qualities of mercy and compassion towards one another as God demonstrates to them. A lack of mercy is regarded as characteristic of godless people.

children.title: Lack of mercy characterises the godless
Lack of mercy on Israel's part was sometimes obedience to God

primaryrefs.comment: Concerning the peoples they were to displace in the promised land.

children.title: Mercy as a greeting and a blessing
